data.title: Ransomware continues to pummel organisations in Southeast Asia
data.description: Kaspersky Cybersecurity Solutions for Southeast Asian businesses detected 57,571 ransomware attacks from January to June 2024.

data.title: Thailand expects 4 million more visitors annually after passing same-sex marriage act
data.description: Legislative change is expected to lift Thailand’s GDP by 0.3% by bringing in more revenue from tourism and generating a slew of new jobs across tourism and the broader economy.

data.title: Ransomware continues to pummel organisations in Southeast Asia
data.description: Kaspersky Cybersecurity Solutions for businesses in Southeast Asia (SEA) detected 57,571 ransomware attacks from January to June 2024.

data.title: Thailand is set to attract an estimated 4 million additional visitors a year following the introduction of the same-sex marriage act.
data.description: Legislative change is expected to lift Thailand’s GDP by 0.3% by bringing in more revenue from tourism as well as generating a slew of new jobs across tourism and the broader economy.

data.title: Siam City Cement Group (SCCC) reports strong Q3 2024 performance with 79% net profit growth
data.description: Siam City Cement Group (SCCC) announced an impressive Q3 2024 financial performance, showcasing a substantial YoY net profit surged by 79% to THB 790 million and YoY EBITDA growth at 15%.

data.title: From Basque country to Bangkok
data.description: Chef Yoshitsugu Yamamoto, owner of Michelin-starred Alarde in Osaka, Japan, is set to make waves in Bangkok this month with an exclusive two-night guest shift on Nov 21 and 22 at UNO MAS at Centara Grand at CentralWorld.

data.title: Glittering elegance
data.description: A part of Piaget

data.title: PM to showcase Thailand’s progress in several areas at APEC Summit
data.description: Paetongtarn to highlight success of public healthcare policy, AI and ecommerce

data.title: Earth’s projected warming hasn’t improved for 3 years
data.description: For the third straight year, efforts to fight climate change haven’t lowered projections for how hot the world is likely to get — even as countries gather for another round of talks to curb warming, according to an analysis Thursday.

data.title: Top golfers will compete in the US$1.7M Honda LPGA Thailand, Feb 20-23, Pattaya
data.description: World-class pro golfers will showcase their skills in the US$1.7 million Honda LPGA Thailand 2025, set for February 20-23 at the iconic Siam Country Club, Old Course in Pattaya.

data.title: Future of Thailand Digital Platforms - Mrs. Morakot Yipintsoi I Time To Talk EP.19
data.description: Join us as we delve into an inspiring conversation with Morakot Yipintsoi, CEO of Yip In Tsoi. Discover the journey behind Yip In Tsoi’s evolution, their unique market strategy, and the values that guide Robinhood.

data.title: SRT challenges land rights ruling in Buri Ram’s Khao Kradong area
data.description: The railway authority fights the decision to not revoke title deeds wrongly given on its property, saying it will recompense residents with correct leases

data.title: Govt supports creative industry, film in Thailand with 30% cash rebate
data.description: Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra hosted a networking reception for Charles H. Rivkin, CEO of the Motion Picture Association (MPA), along with his delegation of top executives from major US film companies, at the Beverly Wilshire Hotel on November 12, 2024,

data.title: MP claims govt shielding ‘certain firm’ over blackchin infestation
data.description: People’s Party member points out that CPF was the only company given a permit to import the fish, which has been destroying the Thai ecosystem

data.title: Chiang Mai decked up with lights for Yi Peng Festival
data.description: Locals and tourists lap up Lanna culture and candle trays on display

data.title: Suvarnabhumi’s Satellite Terminal 1 among 6 most beautiful airports
data.description: Suvarnabhumi Airport’s Satellite Terminal 1 (SAT-1) has been named among the world’s six most beautiful airports this year by Prix Versailles, Transport Minister Suriya Jungrungreangkit said on Wednesday.

data.title: Thaksin rallies Udon Thani voters with promise of 10,000-baht handout
data.description: The former premier has been openly campaigning for Pheu Thai’s candidate despite an ongoing probe into his role in the ruling party’s policies

data.title: Eco-friendly Loy Krathong at 140 locations across Bangkok
data.description: Choose your style: "Traditional with Natural Materials" or "Digital."

data.title: Election agency still investigating case on Thaksin’s role in Pheu Thai
data.description: Officers gathering information and evidence, says top EC official

data.title: DSI arrests six over romance scams causing over 50m baht in damage
data.description: Four Thais, including three women, and two Nigerian men have been arrested for allegedly swindling many in romance scams

data.title: Chiang Mai flights cancelled, rescheduled for lantern festival
data.description: The airport says passengers flying on Friday or Saturday were informed well in advance; the runway will be closely monitored to ensure no floating lanterns have blown in

data.title: Thailand opens 11 low-carbon tourism routes to fight climate change
data.description: Move aimed at promoting eco-friendly tourism, says top official

data.title: Thailand must invest or decline: Finance minister
data.description: Finance Minister Pichai Chunhavajira on Wednesday likened Thailand to a rich old man whose wealth will run out unless he finds new ways to invest it.

data.title: Chiang Mai woman offers 3 months free rent to ‘battle-ready’ tenant
data.description: In her Facebook post, the landlady specifies that the ideal tenant would be skilled in ‘firing sharp words’ to fend off harassing neighbour

data.title: Rare phenomenon inundates Chiang Mai communities
data.description: Two communities in the Chiang Dao district of Chiang Mai province have been inundated for over two months due to rising groundwater.

data.title: Chef Cristina Bowerman takes over Biscotti until Dec 30
data.description: Chef Cristina Bowerman, the only female chef with a Michelin star in Rome for her restaurant, Glass Hostaria, takes over Anantara Siam’s Italian restaurant, Biscotti until Dec 30.
